categori ii (nation park) bedrock outcrops, one, found throughout park. locat summit counti &amp; cuyahoga county, ohio, usa nearest&#160;c akron coordin 41°14′30″n 81°32′59″w﻿ / ﻿41.24167°n 81.54972°w﻿ / 41.24167; -81.54972coordinates: 41°14′30″n 81°32′59″w﻿ / ﻿41.24167°n 81.54972°w﻿ / 41.24167; -81.54972 area 32,832.03 acr (13,287&#160;ha) 20,339.22 acr (8,231&#160;ha) federal[1] establish octob 11, 2000 visitor 2,189,849 (in&#160;2014)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic cuyahoga valley nation park unit state nation park preserv reclaim rural landscap along cuyahoga river akron cleveland northeast ohio. 20,339.22-acr (8,231&#160;ha)[1] park administ nation park servic nation park ohio. establish 1974 cuyahoga valley nation recreat area design nation park 2000. nativ american call wind water "kahyonhá:ke," mean "on river" "at river" mohawk. cuyahoga english spell kahyonhá:ke. english often write cu ga, ya yon, ho ha, ga ke. area sanduski bay cleveland describ canahoque: seat war, mart trade, &amp; chief hunt ground six new york iroquoi lake &amp; ohio.[3] content 1 administr histori 2 attract 2.1 ohio eri canal towpath trail 2.1.1 histori 2.1.2 stanford hous (formerli stanford hostel) 2.1.3 towpath trailhead 3 visitor center 4 point histor interest 4.1 nation regist histor place 5 refer 5.1 gener refer 6 read 7 extern link administr history[edit] valley began provid recreat urban dweller 1870 peopl came nearbi citi carriag ride leisur boat trip along canal. 1880, valley railroad becam anoth way escap urban industri life. actual park develop began 1910 1920 establish cleveland akron metropolitan park districts. 1929 estat cleveland businessman hayward kendal donat 430 acr (170&#160;ha) around richi ledg trust fund state ohio. kendall' stipul "properti perpetu use park purposes". becam virginia kendal park, honor mother. 1930s, civilian conserv corp built much park' infrastructur includ happi day lodg shelter octagon, ledges, kendal lake. although region park safeguard certain places, 1960 local citizen fear urban sprawl would overwhelm cuyahoga valley' natur beauty. activ citizen join forc state nation govern staff find long-term solution. finally, decemb 27, 1974, presid gerald ford sign bill establish cuyahoga valley nation recreat area. nation park servic acquir 47-acr (19&#160;ha) krejci dump 1985 includ part recreat area. request thorough analysi site' content environment protect agency. survey identifi extrem toxic materials, area close 1986 design superfund site.[4] litig file potenti respons parties, includ ford, gm, chrysler, 3m, wast manag ohio. compani except 3m agre settlement; 3m lost trial.[5] cleanup began 1987 complet mid-2011, although area restor origin state wetlands.[6] area redesign nation park congress octob 11, 2000,[7] passag depart interior relat agenc appropri act, 2001, hous bill 4578, 106th congress.[8] administ nation park service. david berger nation memori beachwood, ohio also manag cuyahoga valley nation park. richfield coliseum, multipurpos arena cuyahoga river area, demolish 1999 now-empti site becam part cuyahoga valley nation park upon design 2000. sinc becom grassi meadow popular birdwatchers. attractions[edit] towpath trail provid recreat activ visitor mani visitor spend time hike bicycl park' mani trail visit numer attractions, includ crush limeston along portion 20-mile (32&#160;km) towpath trail, follow former stretch 308-mile (496&#160;km) ohio eri canal. waterfalls, roll hills, cave wind river sceneri attract mani park visitors. steep narrow ravines, roll floodplain, lush farmland contrast one anoth throughout park. anim life also plentiful. ledg provid boulder-strewn cliff relax watch sunset wood sceneri below. sled-rid popular winter kendal hills.[9] park offer array preserv restor display 19th earli 20th centuri sustain farm pastor rural living, cater contemporari interest art exhibits, outdoor concerts, scenic excurs special event railroad tour cuyahoga valley scenic railroad.[10] includ compatible-us site own feder government, includ sever local region park cleveland metropark metro parks, serv summit counti systems, blossom music center, hale farm &amp; village. mid-1980s, park host nation folk festival. ohio eri canal towpath trail[edit] multi-purpos ohio &amp; eri canal towpath trail develop nation park servic major trail cuyahoga valley nation park. run almost 21 mile (33½ km) rocksid road, independence, oh north summit county' bike &amp; hike trail south. follow cuyahoga river much length. restroom found sever trailhead along way commerci food drink found rocksid rd., boston store, peninsula, farmer' market botzum rd., (seasonally). also sever visitor center along way. rocksid rd. connect cleveland metropark trail travel anoth 6 mile (9½ km) north. summit counti trail run akron south. "towpath trail" continu stark tuscarawa counti zoar, ohio; almost 70 mile one signific (1 mile) interruption. section towpath trail outsid cuyahoga valley nation park own maintain variou state local agencies. trail also meet buckey trail nation park (near boston store). anoth section summit counti bike &amp; hike trail system (connect nearbi brandywin falls, also cleveland metropark bedford reserv solon cuyahoga county; hudson stow summit county; kent ravenna portag county, ohio) near-by. seasonally, cuyahoga valley scenic railroad allow visitor travel along towpath rocksid rd. akron get off/on 6 stop along way. especi popular biker view photograph fall colors. cvsr independ own operated. (note - may, 2014, flood damag limit train 6 stop north indigo lake station. entir rout akron expect open shortly.) history[edit] restor ohio &amp; eri canal lock towpath trail follow histor rout ohio &amp; eri canal. canal built, ohio spars settl wilder travel difficult get crop market nearli impossible. canal, built 1825 1832, provid success transport rout cleveland, lake erie, portsmouth, ohio river. canal open ohio rest settl eastern unit states.[11] numer waysid exhibit provid inform canal featur site histor interest.[12] also virtual tour.[11][13] today visitor walk ride along path mule use tow canal boat load good passengers. scene differ then; canal full water carri steadi flow boat amongst constant convers "canawlers." evid beaver seen mani place along trail.[11] stanford hous (formerli stanford hostel)[edit] stanford hous locat cuyahoga valley nation park, ohio locat scenic cuyahoga valley near peninsula, ohio, stanford hous histor 19th-centuri farm home built 1830 georg stanford, one first settler western reserve. 1978, np purchas properti act youth hostel conjunct american youth hostel (ayh) organization. march 2011, stanford hostel becam stanford house, cuyahoga valley nation park' first in-park lodg facility. home renov conserv cuyahoga valley nation park[14] nation park service.[15][16] towpath trailheads[edit] map coordin use osm map coordin use googl map 200 coordin use bing export coordin kml export coordin georss export coordin gpx map microformat coordin place data rdf lock 28 ohio eri canal, vicin peninsula, ohio. lock chamber, look north. origin construct date 1827. depth 16 feet (4.9&#160;m), lock #28 deepest lock portion ohio eri canal akron cleveland henc popular name, deep lock. ohio eri canal tow path trailhead coordin trailhead map conceiv found georg wallace, built sawmil next brandywin fall 1814. encourag other move area, includ brother-in-law, built grist mill opposit side falls. inexpens land avail presenc mill provid lumber, flour, corn meal, villag brandywin began grow. today coupl build remain villag histor photo remnant build foundat allow us rememb brandywin villag was.[25] civilian conserv corp structur unit park.[26][27] georg stanford hous jame stanford move boston township immedi survey name 1806. wife polli son georg first homestead today cuyahoga valley nation park (cvnp). son georg built state greek reviv home 1830. home, locat 6093 stanford road, serv cuyahoga valley hi-stanford hostel.[28] nation regist histor place page contain complet list nation regist histor place locat within cvnp. locat privat owned.[29] hale farm &amp; villag hale farm &amp; villag outdoor live histori museum mile 150 year away. costum "pioneer" interpret describ life western reserv form year unit state america. villag featur 21 histor build tour mani talent craftspeople. oper western reserv histor society. craft demonstr includ glassblowing, candlemaking, broommaking, spin &amp; weaving, cheesemaking, blacksmithing, woodworking, sawmilling, hearth cooking, potteri making. farm also featur oxen, sheep, cows, gardens.[30] [31] nation regist histor places[edit] mani list home privat
